rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious area combining the kitchen and living space. Designed with minimalist aesthetics and ample natural light, incorporating large windows facing east (according to Vastu) to harness morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: An airy bedroom featuring a walk-in closet and adjacent bathroom. Placed in the north-east corner for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable, minimalist guest room with access to the living area. Designed to promote peaceful energy.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space within the ground floor, designed with acoustic panels and ambient lighting for a cinematic experience. Placed in the south-west corner as per Vastu to balance entertainment energy.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility space for storage, laundry and other household needs. Positioned near the kitchen to ensure convenience.
